Sentencas: The adhesion between two adjacent layers in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is critically important to ensure the desired performance.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: However, measuring the interface adhesion is very difficult because most layers in an SOFC are brittle and/or porous.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: This paper introduces a simple technique for the quantitative measurement of interface adhesion of SOFCs.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: A hard, spherically tipped indenter is driven through the top layer(s) and into the underlying substrate of a plate SOFC specimen.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: Extensive plastic deformation of the substrate causes an interface annular crack.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: The interface adhesion is then calculated from the radius of the annular crack.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: The indentation method should be suitable for the adhesion measurement of any SOFC with a porous support.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: A measurement procedure and the related calculation equations for determining the interface adhesion are presented in this paper.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: The interface adhesion of a cermet-supported SOFC with a doped ceria electrolyte for operation at 400-600 degrees C was measured to demonstrate the use of the indentation method.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation

Sentencas: The measurement indicated that the cermet-supported SOFC had sufficient interface adhesion.
Titulo: Measurement of the interface adhesion of solid oxide fuel cells by indentation
